summary: Compatibility patches for SkyRe / ReProccer, Bucklers - Shields and Other Armours, Black Sacrament Armor, Lustmord Vampire Armor, Winter Is Coming - Cloaks, Frostfall, Unique Female Followers, The Art of Magicka, Bandolier - Bags and Pouches, Bandolier for NPCs, the Crossbows Basic Collection, Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation, Temptress Race, etc.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=LimeGreen]SkyRe ReProccer Compatibility Patches[/color][/size]

Compatibility patches for [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286]SkyRe[/URL] / [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28467]ReProccer[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5315]Bucklers - Shields and Other Armours[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5696]Black Sacrament Armor[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852/]Lustmord Vampire Armor[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163]Frostfall[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24664]Unique Female Followers[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040]The Art of Magicka[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22119]Bandolier - Dawnguard[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17805]Bandolier for NPCs[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23876]the Crossbows Basic Collection[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717]Temptress Race[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22545]dwarven rifle Crossbow tipe[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26329]Automatic Crossbows[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16084]Ars Metallica[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14178]Bring Out Your Dead[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846]TERA Armors Collection[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16000]83Willow's Jenassa[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733/]Immersive Armors[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644/]Immersive Weapons[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21163/]Immersive Armors for NPCs[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34093]Weapons and Armor Fixes - Remade with Dawnguard and Dragonborn support[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26017]Destructible Bottles Extended[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21922]Explosive Bolts Visualized[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26344]Skyforge Shields[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21587]Character Creation Overhaul[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35399]Book Covers Skyrim[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18799]Radiant and Unique Potions and Poisons HD[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639]Imps More Complex Needs[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26017]Destructible bottles Extended[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34433]B-D-Y-E-B Shield Mod[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1002]JaySuS Swords[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21377]Automatic Variants[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34605]Skeletons - Truly Undead[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15768]Syynxs Stubborn Skeletons[/URL], [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10175]SkyTEST - Realistic Animals and Predators[/URL] and [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24913]Skyrim Immersive Creatures[/URL] made with [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/]TES5Edit Version 3.0.30 Experimental[/URL].

[size=3]For the Stats.xml I took the one from [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27092]"Balbors and Steelsouls SkyRe ReProccer xml file" Version 1.6, 3.1 and 3.7[/URL].[/size]

[size=3][color=red]For all my patched esps, you need the original mods of course and endorse them, because they are awesome :3[/color][/size]

[size=3]If you have trouble with the question, which mods / patches you should use, here is good guide you could follow:
[URL=http://forum.step-project.com/topic/1957-installing-asis-and-skyre-with-some-additional-stuff/]Installing ASIS and SkyRe with some additional stuff[/URL] by Iroha of the step-project forums. I included some of the patches they made in my compilation.[/size]

[size=3]I recommend using my patches with the [URL=skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37605]Unofficial Skyrim Redone Patches by ExImIeR[/URL][/size]


[size=4][color=LimeGreen]Load-order-example:[/color][/size]


Bashed Patch, 0.esp (Sorted here by BOSS)

Pre Automatic Variants + Skeleton Resurrection + SkyTEST + Immersive Creatures Patches

Automatic Variants.esp (Sorted here by BOSS)

ASIS-Dependency.esp (Sorted here by BOSS)

PreASISPatch / EEO / NoIW

ASIS.esp (If you don't use SUM)

Dual Sheath Redux Patch.esp (Sorted here by BOSS)

Pre ReProccer WA Fixes / IW / UU / aMidianSS / IA patches

qotsafans IA6 Invisible Helmets Patch.esp (Either you put the patch here or after all SkyProccers (see below))

ReProccer.esp (If you don't use SUM)

SkyRe_EnemyAI.esp

SUM.esp

PostASISPatch.esp

ReProccerDragonborn.esp

ReProccer-SkyforgeShields.esp

qotsafans Miscellaneous ReProccer / Immersive Armors / Destruction Tweak Patches

qotsafans LeveledLists + JaySuS Swords + Immersive Weapons + Immersive Armors + BDYEB Patch

qotsafans BOYD / EEO / Jenassa / No JSwords Patches
Immersive Armors for NPCs (If you want IA for NPCs, but are not using BOYD, EEO or Jenassa)

qotsafans Ars Metallica / Harvest Overhaul Patch (A patch for Ars Metallica, not for Harvest Overhaul, but made compatible with HO)

qotsafans Dwarven Rifle / Autorifle / Autocrossbow ReProccer Patches

qotsafans Bucklers Complete / Only ReProccer Patches

qotsafans IA6 Invisible Helmets Patch.esp (BOSS will sort the patch here)

qotsafans Books + Book Covers Skyrim + Hearthfire Patches

qotsafans Ingestibles + Radiant Potions + Unique Booze + IMCN + Destructible Bottles + Hearthfire Patches


[size=4][color=LimeGreen]Version 3.7.2 contains:[/color][/size]


[color=lime]-[/color] My stats.xml merged with Balbors and Steelsouls stats.xml version 3.7

[color=lime]-[/color] My Changes.xml

[color=lime]-[/color] Bucklers-Complete.esp version 2.3 with changed names and keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] Bucklers Only.esp version 2.3 with changed names and keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] Chesko_Frostfall.esp version 2.4a with some added keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] A maximum of 10 additional esps

[color=lime]-[/color] Esps with patches/fixes for BucklersComplete - Shields and Other Armours, BucklersOnly version 2.3, Winter Is Coming - Cloaks version 2.3, Art of Magicka, dwarven rifle Crossbow tipe, Automatic Crossbows, Ars Metallica, Ethereal Elven Overhaul, Bring Out Your Dead, 83Willow's Jenassa and ASIS

[color=lime]-[/color] Combined versions of my optional patches

[color=lime]-[/color] Compatibility esps for Unique Female Followers version 1.0 (with some fixes/changes)

[color=lime]-[/color] Mod exclusions: Winter is coming - Cloaks version 2.3, Art of Magicka, Bandolier - Bags and Pouches + Dawnguard, Bandolier for NPCs

[color=lime]-[/color] BlockList.txt for ReProccer (excluded at the moment) and ASIS block my post-ReProccer patches (and Balbors) (WIC ReProccer Patch for example) from being patched (and used as masters) by the ReProccer, so they can stay activated. (Normally the list is empty and generated after the first run of the SkyProc Patchers)


[size=4][color=LimeGreen]Version 3.0 (Pre SkyRe 1.0) contains[/color] [color=red](on hold in the miscellaneous files section)[/color]:[/size]


[size=3][color=red]Use with:[/color] [color=lime]ReProccer version 1.8, Balbor and Steelsouls SkyRe ReProccer Project version 3.1 (without the Dragonborn patches of course) and SkyRe version 0.99.23 + 0.99.23.5. Just be sure not to use the ReProccerNONPLAYERfix (My Misc patch does the same) and Balbors stats.xml, because they contain the changed values for SkyRe 1.0+[/color][/size]

[color=lime]-[/color] My stats.xml merged with Balbors and Steelsouls stats.xml version 3.1

[color=lime]-[/color] My Changes.xml

[color=lime]-[/color] Bucklers-Complete.esp version 2.3 with changed names and keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] Bucklers Only.esp version 2.3 with changed names and keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] Chesko_Frostfall.esp version 2.2b with some added keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] A maximum of 5 additional esps

[color=lime]-[/color] Esps with patches/fixes for BucklersComplete - Shields and Other Armours, BucklersOnly version 2.3, Black Sacrament Armor, Winter Is Coming - Cloaks version 2.2, Lustmord Vampire Armor, Art of Magicka, Crossbows Basic Collection (just the english version for now), Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation, Temptress Race, dwarven rifle Crossbow tipe, Automatic Crossbows and Ars Metallica

[color=lime]-[/color] Combined versions of my optional patches

[color=lime]-[/color] Compatibility esps for Unique Female Followers version 1.0 (with some fixes/changes)

[color=lime]-[/color] Mod exclusions: Winter is coming - Cloaks version 2.2, Art of Magicka, Bandolier - Bags and Pouches + Dawnguard, Bandolier for NPCs

[color=lime]-[/color] BlockList.txt for ReProccer and ASIS block my post-ReProccer patches (and Balbors) (WIC ReProccer Patch for example) from being patched (and used as masters) by the ReProccer, so they can stay activated. (Normally the list is empty and generated after the first run of the SkyProc Patchers)


[size=4][color=LimeGreen]Version 1.6.2.2 (Pre Dragonborn) contains[/color] [color=red](on hold in the miscellaneous files section)[/color]:[/size]


[color=lime]-[/color] My stats.xml merged with Balbors and Steelsouls stats.xml version 1.6

[color=lime]-[/color] My Changes.xml

[color=lime]-[/color] Bucklers-Complete.esp version 2.3 with changed names and keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] Bucklers Only.esp version 2.3 with changed names and keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] Chesko_Frostfall.esp version 2.2b with some added keywords

[color=lime]-[/color] Esps with patches/fixes for BucklersComplete - Shields and Other Armours, BucklersOnly, Black Sacrament Armor, Winter Is Coming - Cloaks, Lustmord Vampire Armor and Art of Magicka

[color=lime]-[/color] Compatibility esps for Unique Female Followers version 1.0 (with some fixes/changes)

[color=lime]-[/color] Mod exclusions: Winter is coming - Cloaks, Art of Magicka, Bandolier - Bags and Pouches + Dawnguard, Bandolier for NPCs


[size=4][color=LimeGreen]Details for ASIS:[/color][/size]


Load order for my patches:
Asis-Dependency.esp
PreASISPatch.esp
ASIS.esp
SkyRe_EnemyAI.esp
PostASISPatch.esp

[size=3][color=LimeGreen]Please also look at [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38238]Skyre Asis Inis by Getlow2[/URL], they have even more exclusion and for other mods too and it's frequently update, because the community is helping with the process.[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=LimeGreen]Information given for ASIS "Automatic Perks" by ztrathego:[/color][/size]
[quote=ztrathego]
If you don't make changes to AutomaticPerks.ini you are right it doesn't work well with SkyRe. For SkyRe 1.2 this needs to be added under [PERKEXCLUSIONCONTAINS] in AutomaticPerks.ini:

xxxDESGeomancy0
xxxDESGeomancy1
xxxSNESharpshooter1
xxxSNESharpshooter2
xxxLIWOnslaught0
xxxLIWOnslaught1
xxxAlterationAnimunculiPassive
xxxAlterationAnimunculi0
xxxAlterationAnimunculi1
xxxAlterationAnimunculi2
xxxCONBoneMastery0
xxxCONBoneMastery1
xxxCONBoneMastery2
xxxCONBoneMastery3
xxxCONBoneMastery4
xxxCONBoneMastery5
xxxCONTheUnending
xxxFINTreasureHunter1
xxxFINTreasureHunter2
xxxSPETradesOfWar
xxxSNEAmbush0
xxxSNEAmbush1
xxxHIWReapersVerdict0
xxxHIWReapersVerdict1
xxxMARFlanking0
xxxMARFlanking1
xxxMARFlanking2
xxxMARProminentFlanker0
xxxMARProminentFlanker1
xxxMARProminentFlanker2
xxxMARPrey0
xxxMARPrey1
xxxMARPrey2
xxxLIWHornetsSting0
xxxLIWHornetsSting1
xxxLIWHornetsSting2
xxxHIWImpale0
xxxHIWImpale1
xxxHIWImpale2
xxxSPEMasquerade
xxxALTBloodMagic
xxxALTBloodSacrifice
xxxALTBloodWound
xxxENCArcaneArchery
xxxALTMassProduction
xxxLIWStyleSorcerersWrath
[/quote]

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version-29375-2-4.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Now includes Brokefoot UNP Mashup and Temptress Race ReProccer Patches.
Updated stats.xml with changes by Balbor and me.
BlockList.txt for ReProccer and ASIS, so you don't have to deactivate my patches (also added Balbors).
Removed a lot of records, which are patched fine by the ReProccer.

files.name: stats xml update
files.fileName: stats xml update-29375-2-4-1.rar
files.changelogHtml: stats.xml updated to match Balbor's

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version-29375-2-4-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Now contains all my patches (even the optional), with a maximum of 5 additional esps (4 without the IA invisible helmets patch)
Patches updated for WIC version 2.2
Now with conbined versions of my optional patches
All my patches now have my name as a prefix ("qotsafan's"), so they are easier to find for me, for you and they can / have to be placed after the ReProccer.esp for easier understanding.

files.name: stats xml update reupload
files.fileName: stats xml update reupload-29375-2-5.rar
files.changelogHtml:
stats.xml update for Balbor's version 2.5
added armor materials for "Insanitys Shields"

files.name: Armor Calculator for SkyRe version 2
files.fileName: Armor Calculator for SkyRe version 2-29375-2-0.rar

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Wizard Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version-29375-2-5-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Now has a wizard for wrye bash thanks to WilliamImm's suggestion!
Contains versions for Winter Is Coming Crafting Only and No Guards Versions.
Added weapon materials and projectile stats to the stats.xml for the Black Sacrament Armor.
Added a material for SPOA Silver Knight Armor.

files.name: stats xml update
files.fileName: stats xml update-29375-2-6.rar
files.changelogHtml: Stats.xml updated for Balbor's changes to the his stats.xml version 2.6

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Wizard Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Wizard Version-29375-2-7.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Stats.xml updated with Balbor's additions to 2.7
New added weapon materials and type overrides for Frostfall
Miscellaneous Patches now need the Unofficial Skyrim Patch as master
Temper recipes for Wuuthrad and Blade of Sacrifice added to the Miscellaneous Patches

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Wizard Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Wizard Version-29375-2-8.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Patches for dwarven rifle crossbows, combined with the crossbow basic collection patches.
- no leathercraft perk requirements versions (will result in one additional esp) for armored Winter is coming hoods
- versions for armored hoods craftable at the forge, instead of the tanning rack for armored Winter is coming hoods
- missing steel smithing requirements added for armored Winter is coming hoods
New installer for NMM and Wrye Bash: Less options, same results.

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Wizard and Mod Organizer Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Wizard and probably Mod Organizer Version-29375-2-8.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Patches for dwarven rifle crossbows, combined with the crossbow basic collection patches.
- no leathercraft perk requirements versions (will result in one additional esp) for armored Winter is coming hoods
- versions for armored hoods craftable at the forge, instead of the tanning rack for armored Winter is coming hoods
- missing steel smithing requirements added for armored Winter is coming hoods
New installer for NMM and Wrye Bash: Less options, same results.

files.name: stats xml update 2_8_1
files.fileName: stats xml update 2_8_1-29375-2-8-1.rar
files.changelogHtml: stats.xml update for the ReProccer stats.xml 1.8

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version-29375-3-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Added more fixes, added by the unofficial skyrim patch and combed them with the changes by SkyRe
Fixed more daedric artifacts and unique weapons (the ones from unique uniques and immersive weapons are untouched)
Added temper recipes for the ebony blade and the real ebony blade (which is only accessible through the console, if you are searching for it, they are both called ebony blade and it's the second one)
Changed the enchantment from the real ebony blade to the one from the ebony blade, because I think the one from the real version is crap and not very immersive :3
New armor material for the Helm of Ysgramor, compatibility patch for Ars Metallica, installer fixed

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version Pre SkyRe 1
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version Pre SkyRe 1-29375-3-0.rar
files.changelogHtml: Same changes as 3.1, but some were not made, because of the new additions to SkyRe version 1.0

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM Wrye Bash Wizard and Mod Organizer Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM Wrye Bash Wizard and Mod Organizer Version-29375-3-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Added more fixes, added by the unofficial skyrim patch and combed them with the changes by SkyRe
Fixed more daedric artifacts and unique weapons (the ones from unique uniques and immersive weapons are untouched)
Added temper recipes for the ebony blade and the real ebony blade (which is only accessible through the console, if you are searching for it, they are both called ebony blade and it's the second one)
Changed the enchantment from the real ebony blade to the one from the ebony blade, because I think the one from the real version is crap and not very immersive :3
New armor material for the Helm of Ysgramor, compatibility patch for Ars Metallica, installer fixed

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version-29375-3-7.rar
files.changelogHtml:
New stuff added to the stats.xml:
- Sorted weapon_type_definitions and weapon_type_overrides
- New added weapon_materials for W&A Fixes, Immersive Weapons, Skyforge Weapons, Ash material for Dragonborn
- New added armor_materials for W&A Fixes
- Changed material_stats_projectiles damage for Steel from 6 to 5 and for Falmer from 8 to 7
- Changed weapon_type speed for longbows from 0.5 to 0.3
- Mod exclusions added for Automatic Crossbows / dwarven rifle Crossbow tipe (dwarvenrifle.esp, j3x-autocrossbows.esp, dwavenautorifle1.esp)
New patches:
- Pre ReProccer patches for Weapons and Armor Fixes http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34093
- EEO/BOYD patches without JSwords.
- Script Fix included in my Miscellaneous patches by FCqt from the step-project forum
- Destructible Bottles patch by FCqt from the step-project forum
- Explosive Bolts Visualized patch by WilliamImm
- Skyforge Shields patch by WilliamImm
Renamed patches:
- qotsafans EEO patch.esp to qotsafans EEO Patch.esp
- qotsafans EEO + Jenassa patch.esp to qotsafans EEO + Jenassa Patch.esp
- qotsafans IA6 invisible helmets patch.esp to qotsafans IA6 Invisible Helmets Patch.esp
Patches removed:
- Winter is coming (may return because of the crafting requirements)
- Crossbow basic collection
- Black Sacrament Armor
- Lustmord Vampire Armor
- Temptress (now esp replacer)
- Brokefoot UNP Mashup (now esp replacer)

files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version-29375-3-7-2.rar
files.changelogHtml:
- added stuff I missed from the Unofficial Skyrim Redone Patch (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37605) to my misc patches (you can still use the meshes / textures from the mod)
- fixed installers
- removed Tera Leveled Lists patches (use Bashed patch (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840) / Merged patch (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859) instead)
- removed dialog fixes from misc patches (use Guard Dialog Overhaul (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23390) instead)
- made the Leveled Lists patches compatible with High Level Enemies

files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Wizard and Mod Organizer Version-29375-3-7-2.rar
files.changelogHtml:

- fixed installers
- removed Tera Leveled Lists patches (use Bashed patch (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840) / Merged patch (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859) instead)

files.name: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version
files.fileName: All-in-One ReProccer Patches NMM and Wrye Bash Version-29375-3-7-3.rar
files.changelogHtml:
New added patches:
- qotsafans Books + Book Covers Skyrim + Hearthfire Patches
- qotsafans Ingestibles + Radiant Potions + Unique Booze + IMCN + Destructible Bottles + Hearthfire Patches (include the destructible bottles patch by FCqt)
- qotsafans LeveledLists + JaySuS Swords + Immersive Weapons + Immersive Armors + BDYEB Patch
- Pre Automatic Variants + Skeleton Resurrection + SkyTEST + Immersive Creatures Patches

Skeleton Resurrection = Skeletons - Truly Undead

Patches removed:
- Miscellaneous + Leveled Lists patches --> leveled lists patch now completely seperate from the miscellaneous patches, but with more features + new Miscellaneous Immersive Armors patches, which contain the 3 npcs for Immersive Armors for NPCs, which were previously in the Miscellaneous Leveled Lists patches.

New stuff added to the patches:
- My Miscellaneous and Pre ReProccer patches now make Balbor's additional esps obsolete for version 3.7
- My Miscellaneous Patches now include the fixes from the Unofficial Skyrim Redone SkyRe_Main patch version 1.6 (to spare you one esp), mesh and texture fixes not included!
- Added "Non-playable" to the Pre ReProccer patches, to Non-playable vanilla and official dlc armors and added a dreamcloth_exclusion_string for "Non-playable" to the stats.xml, to avoid them being processed as dreamcloth.
- Added a "No Skill Limit"-fix like the No Skill Limit mod by fLokii to my Miscellaneous patches, to spare you one esp, done by request :3

Renamed patches:
- qotsafans EEO / BOYD / Jenassa Patches to qotsafans EEO / BOYD / Jenassa / JSwords Patches
- qotsafans EEO / BOYD / Jenassa / NoJSwords Patches to qotsafans EEO / BOYD / Jenassa Patches
- PreASISPatch / EEO to PreASISPatch / EEO IW
- PreASISPatch / EEO NoIW to PreASISPatch / EEO

Stuff removed from the patches:
- removed SkyRe_Main.esp and SkyRe_Combat.esp from the PostASISPatch

New additions to the stats.xml:
- armor_materials:
--- Visage of Mzund
- weapon_type_definitions:
--- Spiked Club changed from MACE to CLUB
--- Stalhrim Bow set to LONGBOW
--- Soulrender set to SCIMITAR
- ammunition_multiply_exclusion_strings:
--- Dwemer made to a comment
- material_stats_projectiles:
--- Dwemer added
- dreamcloth_exclusion_strings:
--- made to a comment:
----- Hooded
----- Tullius
----- Serana
----- Briar
----- Monk
----- Pirate
----- Skaal
----- Lord
--- added:
----- Non-playable
